name: koishi-plugin-bangumi-onair
description: Query bangumi-data & display bangumi onair in text

description.en: Query and display bangumi that is onair today/this season in text. can also query any day/season. Support bangumi-data & bangumi-API data source.
description.zh: 查询并以文本展示 今日/本季 正在放送的番剧。也支持查询任意 一天/一季。支持 bangumi-data & bangumi-API 数据源。
